Ego infantem curabam iam esurientemesuriens, -ntis, adj.: hungry; sollicita pro eoÂ 
adloquebaradloquor, -i: to speak to, address matrem et fratrem, dabam eis filium.
content.question: What did the speaker of the passage do before giving her child over to her family?

choices.label: Promised to care for her brother
Took care of her own hunger
